Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: lookup("Statistical Account".Name where("No." = field("Statistical Account No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("Statistical Acc. Journal Line".Amount where("Journal Template Name" = field("Journal Template Name"),
                                                                   "Journal Batch Name" = field("Journal Batch Name"),
                                                                   "Statistical Account No." = field("Statistical Account No.")))

Properties.Name: TableRelation

                                                          Blocked = const(false))

Properties.Value:

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("Statistical Ledger Entry".Amount where("Statistical Account No." = field("No."),
                                                        "Global Dimension 1 Code" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 2 Code" = field("Global Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                        "Posting Date" = field(upperlimit("Date Filter")),
                                                        "Dimension Set ID" = field("Dimension Set ID Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
Sum("Statistical Ledger Entry".Amount where("Statistical Account No." = field("No."),
                                                        "Global Dimension 1 Code" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 2 Code" = field("Global Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                        "Posting Date" = field("Date Filter"),
                                                        "Dimension Set ID" = field("Dimension Set ID Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula

sum("Statistical Ledger Entry".Amount where("Statistical Account No." = field("No."),
                                                        "Global Dimension 1 Code" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 2 Code" = field("Global Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                        "Posting Date" = field(upperlimit("Date Filter")),
                                                        "Dimension Set ID" = field("Dimension Set ID Filter")))

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether the balance shown will include closing entries. If you want to see the amounts on income statement accounts in closed years, you must exclude closing entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies by which period amounts are displayed.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how amounts are displayed. Net Change: The net change in the balance for the selected period. Balance at Date: The balance as of the last day in the selected period.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether the entry has been part of a reverse transaction (correction) made by the Reverse action.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of the correcting entry. If this field shows a number the entry has already been reversed, and it cannot be reversed again.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of the original entry that was undone by the reverse transaction.
